page.title: 04Faulkland
page.content: With a high proportion of the parish's under 14 year olds living in faulkland itself, it is significant that there are no provisions for either pre-school or youth club activities in the village. There is however a thriving branch of the Women's Institute in the parish, and the annual village celebration of the Faulkland flower show combines the traditional flower, fruit and vegetable display with sideshows and entertainments. During the period when this study was being carried out, the Faulkland Post office which was also a general store, re-opened. Also during this period the garage ceased selling petrol.
